attributes.action: Strip Baroness Uddin of her honour for lying about her expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Baroness Uddin is yet another peer who feels no shame in lying about her main residence to grab a huge sum of money from us, the tax payers. In designating her main residence as a flat she patently doesn't live in, she's conned us out of over £100,000. This brings the House of Lords into further disrepute, and she should be stripped of her honour forthwith.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
